EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal @ Strata + Hadoop World 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're excited to share with you Pivotal's presence at Strata + Hadoop World <http://strataconf.com/stratany2014> next week, Oct 15-17th in New York City. In case you don't have a ticket yet, use Pivotal20 to get a 20% discount <https://en.oreilly.com/stratany2014/public/register> on your registration.
Pivotal has a big presence this year as a sponsor, presenter and exhibitor. We are also proud to announce that Pivotal, along with GE and Accenture, are the sponsors of Industrial Internet Day <http://strataconf.com/stratany2014/public/content/industrial-internet-day>on Wednesday, October 15th. We will be showing demos of Pivotal Big Data Suite along with our joint Big Data solution with Isilon. We invite you to come to our booth to see our Big Data solution in action and meet our data science team.
Expo Hall Hours:
Thursday, October 16
- 10:30 AM - 5:45 PM - 5:45 PM - 7:15 PM - Reception
Friday, October 17
- 10:30 AM - 4:15 PM
Pivotal Sessions:
10 Amazing Things to do With A Hadoop-based Data Lake Thursday, October 16 @ 12:00 PM Greg Chase, Director, Product Marketing, Big Data
Image Processing on Hadoop <http://strataconf.com/stratany2014/public/schedule/detail/36339> Friday, October 17 @ 2:35 PM Ailey Crow, Senior Data Scientist, Pivotal
Video Analytics in the Big & Fast Streaming Data Era <http://strataconf.com/stratany2014/public/schedule/detail/37833> Wednesday, October 15 @ 11:45 AM Victor Fang, Senior Data Scientist, Pivotal; Dr. Yu Cao, Engineering Manager, EMC Labs China
Industrial Internet Day Closing Panel <http://strataconf.com/stratany2014/public/schedule/detail/37944> Wednesday, October 15 @ 4:15 PM Jon Bruner, Editor-at-Large, O'Reilly Media; Leo Spiegel, Senior Vice President, Corporate Development and Strategy, Pivotal
Big Data Jam Session with Pivotal and Isilon <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/strata-hadoop-world-big-data-jam-session-pivotal-isilon> Thursday, October 16 @ 1:30 PM Join EMC Chief Solution Strategist, Ryan Peterson, and Ailey Crow, Pivotal Senior Data Scientist in this intimate round table discussion. They will swap customer stories, tips and lessons learned in the big data analytics trenches.
Pivotal, GE and Accenture sponsor Industrial Internet Day Wednesday, October 15 @ 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM A day full of sessions that will showcase the way that power plants, factories, cars, and airplanes make use of sensors and software intelligence to improve operations and help managers make good decisions.
We would love to schedule an in person meeting during the conference. Please send an email to info@pivotal.io <mailto:info@pivotal.io> and we will find a time that works.
See you in NYC! The Pivotal Team
